name: Cloud Zero
description:
Manage your heat and reach ludicrous speed by avoiding to crash. Turn to reduce your heat and Boost to increase it.

Have fun scoring as many point as you can or enjoy a relaxed fly in free mode.

Controls : 

  • W : Boost
  • A / D : Turn
  • Escape : Menu

A Game By Alexis Lessard (https://twitter.com/Alexis_Lessard/)

Font : Asgalt by Rémi Lagast  (http://www.dafont.com/asgalt.font)

Music (Post-Jam Version) : Alternate - Vibe Tracks
